attributes.additional_details:
As our bills continue to rise and sometimes out of government hands with world cartel oil prices.

I want a royal commission on giving every household a reasonable  electric quarterly allowance as a two tier solution, so that you can then judge for yourself who you want to supply you with electricity, by cost per unit, direct debit, online, paper free etc etc
But the allowance is VAT zero and everything above that in that quarter is 20%...

This would reduce carbon emissions’ , turn off what your not using and save money ...
